column1: Best wishes to Mayor Schember as he battles this cancer. Praying for a speedy and full recovery. https://t.co/Lsctyb9PDh

This has been the most productive week in trade policy in decades. Yesterday @POTUS @realDonaldTrump signed the Phase One trade agreement with China and today the Senate will pass USMCA.  Proud to stand behind this president as he fights for American workers!

The era of economic surrender is over!  Great job @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and @USTradeRep for achieving the first step in re-balancing our trade relationship with China. Western Pennsylvania workers thank you for your leadership! https://t.co/KPtYglYHzm

When President Obama ordered the elimination of Osama bin Laden Republicans cheered his decision. Last night Democrats showed more concern over the 2020 election than the loss of American lives. @POTUS @Realdonaldtrump was right to eliminate one of the world's top terrorists. https://t.co/xYBoBGG9gA

.@POTUS @realDonaldTrump was right to eliminate Qasem Soleimani one of one of the world's most dangerous terrorists. Sadly House Democrats have turned this win for America into a political spectacle. I voted against their partisan war powers resolution tonight. https://t.co/XJcuYPuEOg

After years of aggression and the last administration's appeasement policy America is confronting the world’s largest state sponsor of terror under @POTUS @realDonaldTrump’s leadership. Iran’s attacks on Americans and our allies will not be tolerated.

The death of Qassem Soleimani is a triumph of good over evil. Those who seek to kill and harm Americans and other innocent people will face justice. Thank you to @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and our military for your leadership in fighting terrorism!

My heart goes out to @repjohnlewis. He has spent his life fighting for others and now he is in a fight for his life.  It is an honor to serve alongside him in Congress and to call him my friend. I wish him the best as he battles this cancer. https://t.co/jeO3PSIsD1

Last night Democrats impeached @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. Today the House passes a trade deal that's one of his top priorities. What a difference a day makes.  #USMCA is a big win for America a Christmas present for workers & farmers wrapped in red white & blue wrapping paper!

Irony: Dems accuse @realDonaldTrump of abuse of power while blatantly abusing theirs w/ a partisan impeachment of an elected president. Their self-righteous references to oaths & the Constitution obscure the obvious intent: political vengeance.  I voted against both articles.

.@POTUS to @SpeakerPelosi: You are the ones interfering in America’s elections subverting America’s democracy & obstructing justice. You are the ones bringing pain & suffering to our Republic for your own selfish personal political & partisan gain.  Fact check: True!

Another promise made and kept despite the Do-Nothing-Democrats' impeachment charade. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump and @USTradeRep are delivering for American workers farmers and businesses. This new trade deal w/ China is another great win for America. 🇺🇸  https://t.co/igfWr6pmQa

Democrats have made it crystal clear all along that the drive for impeachment is about political vengeance & damaging @POTUS @realDonaldTrump ahead of the 2020 election.  I will vote against both articles of impeachment on the House floor.

Prescription drug policy should be about people not politics!  I oppose H.R. 3 because it means #FewerCures.  I support H.R. 19 because it means #MoreCures.   We should focus on bipartisan solutions that don’t threaten medical innovation for Maddie & millions of other Americans. https://t.co/dp0wCTtXWq

Promises made promises kept! USMCA is a big win & will further boost America's economy.  Thank you to @POTUS @realDonaldTrump for replacing NAFTA with a deal that puts American workers farmers manufacturers & businesses first!  🇺🇸🇺🇸  https://t.co/Z61WqfFeLz

Proud to support the bipartisan Lower Costs More Cures Act legislation to lower prices of prescription drugs.  Millions of Americans are struggling to pay for the medicines they need to lead healthy lives. We can & must act to solve the prescription drug affordability crisis! https://t.co/8oCSiYARIa

The impeachment screenplay is getting bad reviews but Speaker Pelosi insists the show must go on even though it meets none of her own criteria.  Democrats were always going to do this. They wrote the final scene the day @POTUS @realDonaldTrump was elected. https://t.co/0MioTRxuOq

Today we remember the Sailors & Marines who lost their lives in the catastrophe that brought America into World War II.  Thank you to the “Greatest Generation“ the men & women who fought to defend freedom abroad & may the memory of those lost at Pearl Harbor live forever.  🇺🇸🇺🇸

The evidence is undeniable. When the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act let you keep more of your hard-earned dollars & @POTUS @realDonaldTrump removed job-killing Obama era regulations life got better for all Americans.  Our economy continues to exceed expectations!  https://t.co/3XHzZRLeB1

.@SpeakerPelosi's call for articles of impeachment isn't news. Democrats committed to this the day @realDonaldTrump was elected.  We knew they would get here one way or another but Americans know this is nothing more than sour grapes over 2016.  I stand with @POTUS!

This Judiciary Committee hearing is more political theater with different actors. This time the cast are partisan college professors that Democrats hope will save their failing impeachment campaign.  It won't work because the facts are w/ @POTUS @realDonaldTrump.

Good policy gets results for American workers!  Since taking office @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's pro-growth policies coupled with the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act have led to significantly higher household incomes for America's growing middle-class.  ⬇️ 🇺🇸 💪 https://t.co/AjtzMFdBIm

One year ago today @potus @realDonaldTrump signed #USMCA but instead of passing it next week the House will enter the next phase of the impeachment scam.  Americans deserve better than the political games Speaker Pelosi and House Democrats are playing.

As we approach the #Thanksgiving holiday millions of Americans with #diabetes would be grateful for a true affordable generic #insulin. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump can help clear the way!⬇️ https://t.co/adrNxgvm1T

More of the same from Speaker Pelosi and House Democrats who have put politics ahead of good policy for the American people all year.  USMCA border security bipartisan drug pricing legislation & more - all casualties of Adam Schiff's impeachment scam.  https://t.co/iKPNk9YIK8

The facts are with @POTUS @realDonaldTrump. This charade has never been more than political theater and the American people know it. All they had to do was read the transcript.  Time to end these partisan #ImpeachingHearings and get back to the people’s work.

America’s economy is booming and we can give it another boost by passing #USMCAnow! @potus @realDonaldTrump and @USTradeRep negotiated a great deal for American farmers ranchers businesses & manufacturers. Let’s get this over the finish line. https://t.co/06CVzUZmGG

Nearly 10% of Americans are diabetic and they are facing an insulin affordability crisis. The insulin market needs generic competition. That's why I wrote HR 4244 the MAGIC Act to establish a clear & permanent path to generic insulin approval at @USFDA.  #WorldDiabetesDay

These hearings are nothing more than a show. Democrats made up their mind to impeach the day @POTUS @realDonaldTrump was elected. They will stop at nothing to achieve that goal.  These facts close the curtain on Adam Schiff's political theater.⬇️⬇️ https://t.co/K2e33KrnnH

Adam Schiff’s impeachment screen play isn’t turning out as he hoped. Act I was the Russia collusion hoax which failed to give him his chosen ending. Then came Act II the tall tale of Ukraine.   This sham inquiry is DC politics at its worst and Americans know it.

Thank you to America’s heroes - our veterans - for the selfless sacrifices you and your families have made for our nation. The freedom we enjoy today only persists because men and women like you have fought to defend it. We are grateful for your service. Happy Veterans Day! https://t.co/Tp2dEX44Dt
Happy birthday @USMC! Thank you to all of our marines for serving America in defense of freedom! https://t.co/cnDttqhO4U

Whistleblower attorney in 2017 talked of coup & rebellion.  His client coordinated w/ Schiff on the complaint that started the inquiry. Their star witness Taylor wasn’t on call & never spoke to @POTUS.  The dossier & Mueller failed. Act III of the impeachment saga is failing too. https://t.co/8tV1EOxqTV

Yesterday I asked Speaker Pelosi to make public all depositions from the impeachment inquiry.  Despite a vote by Democrats to make the inquiry public Adam Schiff continues to selectively release information and conduct hearings behind closed doors. https://t.co/LaRQtJ666F

After weeks of Adam Schiff's secret hearings & selective leaks the Do-Nothing-Dems are trying to legitimize the unfair inquiry already underway. This resolution is a mirage – a false sense of fairness transparency & due process. This sham contains none of those American values.

America sent a clear message this weekend: we won’t rest until ISIS & other terrorists are brought to justice. The death of Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi a leader of ISIS is a major victory in the war on terror. I thank the brave men & women in uniform who carried out this mission.

I support @RepublicanStudy's plan for personalized & affordable #HealthCare4U.  The status quo doesn't work especially for those with pre-existing conditions. We can make healthcare affordable again by empowering patients and rejecting a government-run health system! https://t.co/iWwjWYJ1f4

There’s a lot at risk here. Drug prices only matter if they’re on the shelf. @SpeakerPelosi's price-fixing scheme means #FewerCures & fewer jobs because it discourages investment in new life-saving medicines a process that's already regulated time consuming & risky. https://t.co/6EOtAGcPc5

For years @RepAdamSchiff has mislead the American people to bolster his case for impeachment of @potus @realDonaldTrump. Tall tales outright lies secret partisan hearings and selective leaks. All unacceptable conduct. Tonight I will vote to #CensureAdamSchiff.

The #DoNothingDemocrats legislative agenda:  🚫Passing USMCA 🚫Border security 🚫Bipartisan plan to lower drug prices ✅Impeach @POTUS @realDonaldTrump   How long will @HouseDemocrats neglect the American people to exact political vengeance on the president?

Happy 244th birthday to the best Navy in the world the @USNavy!  Thank you to our sailors and marines from each generation who have served America by defending freedom across the globe.  #244NavyBday https://t.co/TlByGSXoFY

.@HouseDemocrats have used their time in the majority to pass messaging bills that only the far left can stomach. Now they’re focused solely on impeachment of @POTUS while blaming Republicans for the fact that Congress can’t get anything done.   Americans deserve better!

Impeachment isn’t a game but @HouseDemocrats are treating it like one. Americans elected their reps to solve problems not undo elections they can’t accept. The real crime here is the political theater meant to obstruct @potus @realDonaldTrump & Congress from getting things done!
Great news for American seniors! https://t.co/8GcDuI7VMs

Erie PA was among the first to enlist the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act’s opportunity zones to revitalize it’s once thriving downtown. The Gem City’s future is bright because of its forward thinking leadership.   I am proud to represent this resilient town! https://t.co/RB2HqucjGd

I just signed on to @RepAndyBiggsAZ's resolution to censure @RepAdamSchiff for lying to the public about @POTUS @realDonaldTrump's call with the Ukrainian president. He also misled Americans many times during the Russia collusion hoax investigation. This behavior is inexcusable.

Incredible news: The September #jobsreport says the U.S. unemployment rate dropped to 3.5% for the first time since 1969!   🚨Economic opportunity is at a 50-year high.🚨  Let's keep our foot on the gas and pass #USMCA so the October report is even better! https://t.co/lfzeNADv59

More good news for America's energy independence!  Far more natural gas in the Appalachian Basin than previously estimated much of it right here in western Pennsylvania!  Great work by @USGS! https://t.co/ikycRGPjWf

Socialist Dems haven't accepted that Americans chose @realDonaldTrump in Nov. 2016 so it's no surprise @SpeakerPelosi announced impeachment w/o evidence to back their allegations. Text of convo w/ Ukraine president shows this is another "crying wolf" moment for @HouseDemocrats!

Today was the 10th annual Childhood Cancer Caucus Summit where survivors families health professionals & members of Congress celebrated this decade's progress in new cures & discussed future strategy.  We can & will win end childhood cancer!  Thanks @RepMcCaul & @GKButterfield https://t.co/vqBX8mW7Dj
ICYMI! https://t.co/K7tPIjMbQv

Today we remember the Americans we lost on #September11 18 years ago. We honor them alongside those who have given their lives fighting for freedom since that awful day.  We must #neverforget what happened and continue defending liberty from those who would take it away.

Today I unveiled HR 4244 the MAGIC Act to establish a clear & permanent approval path for true generic #insulin at @US_FDA. Generics are historically cheaper & reduce drug prices. This bill will ensure that Americans who need life-saving insulin finally have affordable options!

Democrats: GOP tax bill fiscally irresponsible & only helps rich & corporations.  Reality: @USCBO says FY19 revenue⬆️3% & @taxfoundation reports incomes less than $1 million/yr paid fewer taxes.  Truth: Tax cuts were for working families & DC's problem is spending not revenue!

The Erie Homecoming 2019 showed how the Gem City is a national leader in leveraging #OpportunityZones.   Thank you to @SecretaryCarson & Scott Turner from the White House for joining us yesterday to talk about a program that is revitalizing distressed areas throughout America. https://t.co/pUbNJEnOiZ

Guaranteeing medical care for babies who survive abortions is neither controversial or partisan but @HouseDemocrats have blocked the #BornAliveAct more than 80 times this year. @SpeakerPelosi will you please help us #EndInfanticide? https://t.co/rjxb8227zb

Americans across our country are grieving with the families and loved ones of those killed this weekend in El Paso and Dayton. I am praying for the recovery of injured survivors and for an end to these senseless and tragic acts of violence.

Great news for the millions of workers employed by small businesses! Thank you @USDOL.  Now we need the Senate to pass the #SECUREAct to help Americans increase savings during their working years to build security for their golden years. https://t.co/kTgvKjyJ9y

I voted 'NO' on the budget agreement. America is driving toward a fiscal cliff and this deal puts more pressure on the gas pedal. Democrats rejected modest spending cuts to pay for increased spending overall. We must acknowledge that this can't continue forever.

Thank you @ScottGottliebMD. I've heard conflicting info. Generic drug makers say they can produce true generic insulin *without* technical challenges. They merely lack an approval pathway at @US_FDA. @FDACommissioner Sharpless: What's your take on this urgent matter? https://t.co/vNUrYAnycw

.@ScottGottliebMD: To be clear are you saying generic drug makers can file an ANDA w/@US_FDA today & be approved for true #GenericInsulin? A 'yes' could help end the affordability crisis and grant relief to millions of Americans w/#diabetes who need cheaper #insulin to live. https://t.co/dPkbi22eoj

.@HouseDemocrats are hurting American workers by unnecessarily delaying #USMCA which would generate:  👨‍🔧76000 new jobs 🚘$34 billion in U.S. auto manufacturing investment 🔩$23 billion annual purchases of American made auto parts  We need #USMCAnow!  https://t.co/HtR9AD8roJ

America isn't about minimums. Nobody comes to America for a minimum wage increase. They come to America for maximum opportunity! Dems had a chance to lift all boats in 2017 but opposed the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act. Now they turn their back on workers again with job-killing policies. https://t.co/1oiWZCDCeN

.@HouseDemocrats say they're helping workers w/ $15/hour min wage which @USCBO says would eliminate 1 million+ jobs. They opposed the Tax Cuts & Jobs Act which gave workers the best economy in 50 yrs. If they want America to soar they should stop putting roadblocks in the way!

Too generous? Too good? That doesn't make any sense. That's why we're voting today to get rid of Obamacare's Cadillac Tax which will put a 40% penalty on high-cost employer sponsored health insurance plans. I'm glad we came together to stop this tax on American families! https://t.co/LNBssZxYXP

Today the House will vote to repeal Obamacare's so-called "Cadillac Tax" a punitive penalty on employer-provided health insurance. This tax never made sense & discourages employers from offering good benefits to workers! Thanks @RepJoeCourtney for authoring this bill with me.

American diabetics are struggling with an insulin affordability crisis. Over the last two decades the price of this life-saving drug is up 600%! Generic insulin on the market would bring down the cost so today I asked @US_FDA about pathways toward this goal! https://t.co/Tmh0sZgVnW

#USMCA is a big win for America. Our farmers ranchers businesses & workers stand to gain substantial benefits from this agreement. @POTUS @realDonaldTrump & @USTradeRep negotiated a 21st century trade deal for our 21st century economy. Let's pass #USMCANow. No time to waste! https://t.co/2wnLyiDCrP

The economy is still roaring according to the June jobs report:  👩‍⚕️224000 new jobs 💰3.1% wage growth for 11th straight month 🧰3.7% national unemployment rate 📈Increase in labor force participation  It's a great time to be an American worker!  https://t.co/luOhhu2ubT

Let us honor the sacrifices of the heroes who have fought for our cherished freedoms and those who defend them still today. We are blessed to be the land of the free and the home of the brave. https://t.co/5iqhhs5fgZ

As we join together with family and friends today let us pause to celebrate and give thanks for that historic day in 1776 when the Declaration of Independence was adopted and the greatest nation on earth was born! https://t.co/GAlwL26YJz

As I mentioned yesterday if @SpeakerPelosi is serious about addressing the border crisis she’ll bring a bipartisan bill to the House floor that @POTUS will sign. The Senate which passed a bill 84-8 just gave her that opportunity. The @HouseGOP is ready to pass it now!

#USMCA protects US innovators because Canada & Mexico will:   💡Do more to protect IP ⏱️Approve patent apps more quickly  🏥Increase market access for US medical innovations  Why delay these great benefits for U.S. companies and inventors? Let's pass #USMCAnow! https://t.co/OzUCvLHTT8

Until @SpeakerPelosi believes a solution to the border crisis is more important than political points Americans and migrants will continue to suffer. Let’s pass a bill that addresses humanitarian AND security issues & give @DHSgov & @TheJusticeDept what they need!

I was honored to work w/ @repjohnlewis on the Taxpayer First Act which will head to @POTUS later today!  This is the first reform of the IRS in two decades. It will make the agency a resource not an adversary for U.S. taxpayers. When we work together great things happen. https://t.co/h2Vum0ZSSq

Mexico ratified #USMCA and is working to address the border crisis by helping stem the flow of migrants north. We’re getting more help from the Mexican government than @HouseDemocrats on border security and fair trade. What gives @SpeakerPelosi? #BorderCrisis #USMCACostofDelay

#MedicareforAll is quality care for none. Here's what it would mean for American families:  Long lines. No choice. Higher taxes. Broken promises to seniors.   Americans want us to improve what's broken and preserve what isn't not throw out what's good with the fixable. https://t.co/G8jikok3BT

The #USMCA delay hurts American farmers. Passing it will:  ✅Preserve duty-free access to Mexico. ✅Expand duty-free access to Canada for dairy & other products. ✅Remove uncertainty for farmers & ranchers.  All of this is good for U.S. consumers & producers. Let's get it done!

Happy Flag Day! On June 14 1777 Congress adopted the American flag which is a symbol of freedom & liberty. Many have fought & died for that flag since the revolution so it's fitting that it shares a bday w/ the @USArmy created on this date in 1775. #FlagDay2019  #ArmyBDay https://t.co/Q6jxFrrRTm

Glad to see the Taxpayer First Act is heading to @potus for signature! This bipartisan bill the first reform of the IRS since 1998 will make it a service-first agency and a resource rather than an adversary for American taxpayers. Thanks for working on this w/ me @repjohnlewis!

Witness at W&M Cmte hearing just said that bureaucrats in Washington will decide who is eligible for treatments and that individual choice in healthcare would be diminished under #MedicareForAll. Do @HouseDemocrats really want a one-size-fits-all Hcare system controlled in D.C.?

Today the House Ways & Means Cmte will hold a hearing on #MedicareForAll. Americans want to protect what works and improve what doesn't. M4A would take away private plans and force everyone on gov healthcare. No choice longer waits & broken promises to seniors. Bad policy!

Each day we delay USMCA U.S. workers and industry lose opportunity.  When NAFTA was written the internet wasn't major part of commerce. USMCA creates new standards for digital trade. Let's bring trade with Mexico and Canada into the 21st century by passing #USMCA now!

75 years ago today America & its allies invaded Normandy to liberate Europe from the evil of Nazi tyranny. These men changed the course of history. We honor their memory and will continue their fight for liberty for future generations!  #DDay75thAnniversary #Veterans #Normandy75 https://t.co/NTR1JkOXYg

Today we remember those who gave their lives in defense of freedom. Our nation is grateful to them and to their families who share in that sacrifice. Words cannot repay our debt but we will never forget what you’ve done for us and our world.  #MemorialDay2019

Today's effort is adding security in retirement years to every American. The opportunity to go into those golden years with a little gold in your pocket so you can get through it.  Grateful that the people's House came together today to pass the SECURE Act. https://t.co/rE6Pf84pl7

Today the House passed the SECURE Act!  ✅Help Americans save for retirement ✅Help small biz offer retirement plans to employees ✅Help Gold Star Families  Thanks @RepRichardNeal @RepKevinBrady & @RepRonKind for working with me on this. When we work together Americans win! https://t.co/IcsWIIX3pC

Jobs Jobs Jobs! Pennsylvania has the lowest unemployment since 1976 at 3.8%. The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and President @realDonaldTrump's policies are knocking the rust off the rust belt states!  "Americans' View of Job Market Hits New High" - @Gallup   https://t.co/7Tx2XjlW1l
Thank you @POTUS and @USACE_Buffalo for working with me to get this done for my constituents and the millions of tourists who visit Presque Isle each year! https://t.co/9hzXChvOLe

Short line rail is vital to farmers small towns and businesses.  The BRACE Act which I co-authored with @repblumenauer will make permanent the deduction for maintenance expenses. Rural America must stay connected to main rail lines!  #InfrastructureWeek #BuildForTomorrow

Public buildings across the US are in need of repair.  I wrote the Public Buildings Renewal Act w/ @repblumenauer to allow more private activity bonds so the private sector to invest in America’s aging schools police stations and more!  #infrastructureweek #BuildForTomorrow

This is such an inspiring story. The @NHS_LANCERS and @SrahsBaseball displaying the character of Western PA on the baseball field. Way to step in the box Nolan and great hit! https://t.co/pB0iliz0Gx https://t.co/4rYUVtm4xJ

The Port of Erie is central to Western PA's economy. Dedicated $ for dredging has been used for other things.  The Full Utilization of the Harbor Maintenance Trust Fund Act would ensure fund $ is used for what its name implies: harbors!  #InfrastructureWeek #BuildForTomorrow
Thank you President @realDonaldTrump! The Great Lakes are a national treasure and a big part of Western PA’s economy! https://t.co/9BAadprGnY

Private investment in fixing America's roads will be critical which is why @repblumenauer & I wrote the BUILD Act (HR 2541) a bill to increase limits on private activity bonds states and local gov can use for highways & freight projects.  #BuildForTomorrow #InfrastructureWeek

The healthcare bill on House floor today:  Protects people with PreX conditions? 🚫 Decreases cost of Hcare? 🚫 Stops states from innovating & improving their own HCare markets? ✅  Promotes federal takeover of HCare? ✅  Dems putting politics over people.. again #ForThePolitics

Americans want us to build on what works and fix what doesn't not have the gov take over healthcare. Medicare for All (None*) would kick 155000000 people off of their private health insurance plans and shortchange seniors in a program designed for them. That's not good policy.

@POTUS knows what business owners everywhere know: when you have the best hand play it! We must fight to regain the market share lost to China after decades of bad trade policy. U.S. workers are counting on us to stand our ground for the best deal.  https://t.co/h7scFbG7Ya

China for decades has taken advantage of our lax trade policy. They won't walk away from their biggest customer. I'm glad @realDonaldTrump keeps fighting for the best trade deal he can for U.S. workers. When America stands strong the world stays safe. We must stay the course.

Fund infrastructure?✅  Reduce the debt?✅  Create jobs? ✅  Raise Taxes? ❌  The GAIIN Act is a win-win-win to help us upgrade America’s roads rails runways and bridges in rural and urban communities!  https://t.co/YlF8rXe2oc

Thank you @GOPLeader McCarthy for supporting the GAIIN Act a bipartisan proposal to pay down the debt and fund infrastructure projects without raising taxes on hard-working Americans. We must build an infrastructure for the 21st century economy!  https://t.co/0ktv6XAFI9
